DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate bioequivalence Mylan 's olmesartan medoxomil 40 mg tablet Sankyo 's Benicar® 40 mg tablet follow single , oral 40 mg ( 1 x 40 mg ) dose administer fasting condition .
DOC.brief_title: Fasting Study Olmesartan Medoxomil Tablets 40 mg Benicar® Tablets 40 mg
DOC.criteria: healthy , adult subject , 18 year older able swallow medication institutionalized subject history significant disease use prescription OTC medication within 14 day start study receive investigational product within 30 day prior start study
